members.name: DepreciationRate
members.description: Depreciation rate (e.g. percentage).

members.name: FixedAssetDepreciableBasis
members.description: Depreciable basis of the fixed asset.

members.name: FixedAssetFairValue
members.description: Fair value of the fixed asset.

members.name: FixedAssetRealizedGainLossAccount
members.description: GL account number on which Income Statement amount is recognized for realized gain/loss.

members.name: FixedAssetRealizedGainLossAmount
members.description: Realised gain or loss on revaluation

members.name: FixedAssetReplacementCost
members.description: Replacement cost of the fixed asset.

members.name: FixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
members.description: GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recorded for unrealized gain/loss.

members.name: FixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAmount
members.description: Amount of unrealized gain/(loss) recorded on the Balance Sheet for the fixed asset removal.

members.name: GL Account
members.description: GL Account for the depreciation posting.

members.name: LotNumber
members.description: Tracked by lot number. True or false.

members.name: PurchaseOrderID
members.description: Purchase order ID of the addition

members.name: SupplierID
members.description: Supplier ID

members.name: SupplierName
members.description: Name of the supplier

members.name: TaxCode
members.description: Tax code for the sale

members.name: UniqueID
members.description: Unique identifier for the removal entry.

members.name: GL TransactionID
members.description: Transaction ID in GL.

members.name: ApprovedBy
members.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file (for person who approved the entry).

members.name: ApprovedByDate
members.description: The date the entry was approved.

members.name: ApprovedByTime
members.description: The time this transaction was entered into the system. ISO 8601 representing time in 24- hour time (hhmm) (for example, 1:00 PM = 1300).

members.name: EnteredBy
members.description: User_ID (User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

members.name: EnteredDate
members.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

members.name: EnteredTime
members.description: The time this transaction was entered into the system. ISO 8601 representing time in 24- hour time (hhmm) (for example, 1:00 PM = 1300).

members.name: LastModifiedBy
members.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file (for person who approved the entry).

members.name: LastModifiedDate
members.description: The date the entry was last modified.

members.name: LastModifiedTime
members.description: The time the last entry was modified. ISO 8601 representing time in 24-hour time (hhmm) (for example, 1:00 PM = 1300).

members.name: BusinessUnitCode
members.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match a Business_Unit_Code in the Business_Unit_Listing file.

members.name: FixedAssetID
members.description: Unique identifier; may require a concatenation, such as Business_Unit_Code + Fixed_Asset_Code.

members.name: SerialNumber
members.description: Tracked by serial number. True or false.
